1.content: There was a dark but well kept secret in the city of Farrowville. Many years ago the corporation known as Chem World International had decided to dump most of its waste underground, right next to a quiet little suburb in Farrowville. No one in the corporation knew of its effects, or that it would take several years for the effects to manifest. Even worse, the waste generated by CWI would be most harmful to the youngest residents of the small suburban community.
1.title: The dark secret of Farrowville

11.content:
As the years went on CWI eventually went out of business, the environmentalists gave up their crusade to stop the bio chemical dumping, and the residents of Farrowville soon forgot the controversy. The suburb expanded, building houses, schools, and parks over the toxic land. As it happened there was a park built over the most toxic area of land in the whole suburb. And in this park was a children's playground which included swings, a sand box, a slide, and various other forms of amusement for the happy go lucky children of Farrowville.

Month after month the children were exposed to the dangerous materials emanating from under their feet. The busy children's parents had neglected to notice their children had stopped growing for the past several months and were even showing signs of a reduction in height. Little did they know a small earthquake would cause a massive leak in bio chemical materials, causing the children to have an extreme height reduction.
11.title: eruption of danger

111.content:
Justin Bell was an active child. Day after day he would go to play at the park in his neighborhood. He especially loved to play in the sandbox with his toy trucks, heaping handfulls of sand into them, pretending he was working on a construction site like his father. His father was involved in construction, but not as a worker. He owned a company that had been contracted to build most of the suburbs in the town. He had become considerably wealthy and had married a woman to worthy of his income. Andrea was quite tall, in fact at 6ft she was a giantess in her own right. In order to keep her statuesque figure at the age of 40, she would jog to the park every day at 5 o'clock to make sure her son Justin came home in time for dinner.

On this particular day as Justin was playing in the sandbox with several of his friends, the earth began to quake slightly beneath them. The children didn't think much of it, afterall they lived in a state that had its share of earthquakes. They also didn't think much of the colorless liquid that began leaking from the ground creating small puddles in the sandbox.

Justin, in a playful gesture, picked up a gob of wet sand and threw it at his long-time friend Shin, who came from a wealthy japanese family that had invested in the company owned by Justin's father. As soon as the toxic sand left Justin's hand, he began to feel quite ill and collapsed to the ground. Shin, covered in the sand began to feel ill as well. In fact, all the children in the sand box suffered the same fate as they had all interacted with the mysterious substance. Justin, Shin, and the others awoke to a bizarre site. All around them were enormous sand dunes that spread out before them like a desert. There was something odd about the dunes though. They were wet...
111.title: The Kids Aren't Alright

choices: Justin warns his friends in time
Some of the kids aren't so lucky
1111.content:
Justin looked up into the clear afternoon sky, trying to figure out where he and his friends had been transported to. Had aliens captured them and teleported them to their world? No, despite what he thought were new surroudings, everything seemed oddly familiar to him. As if he had seen it all in a dream or past life. He looked over at his friend Shin, who was asking the other children if they knew what had happened. Justin was about to go over to his friend to formulate some kind of plan to escape the damp desert when he heard a rumbling.

The 6 foot tall mother of Justin, known as Andrea to her friends and servants, was making her way to the sand box. It had been a pleasant jog to the park, and she was looking forward to walking home with her son, discussing what he would like for dinner as they always did. She stood in front of the sandbox, where she would normally find Justin and glanced around the park. Strangely, the children that normally filled all corners of the park were absent. Andrea looked at the expensive watch her husband had bought her. The time was right...maybe Justin had gone to Shin's house to play as he sometimes did. She was about to leave when she glanced down at the sand box again. She had missed the opportunity to go to the beach and get her tan as she normally did. Well sand box sand is as good as any right?

Andrea slipped off her shoes and laid down her exercise towel. Barefoot, she slowly stepped into the sand. It was slightly moist to her surprise, but the left over toxic materials would have no effect on her as she had not been exposed to it in its pure state.

Meanwhile, Justin looking up screamed for his life. His mother was a giant blonde monster threatening to squish him and his friends under her smooth, tan, well manicured foot...
1111.title: The blonde giant arrives

choices: Andrea goes to sleep on her towel
Justin and others climb on, they leave with her
11112.content:
Justin looked in the direction his giant mother was stepping. Without knowing it, she was about to bury a large number of the neighborhood's children beneath her feet. Unless Justin did something, this sandbox would be his friend's giant grave. He started shouting at his friends, who were just now trying to adjust to their new height and were to close to the walls of the sandbox to look over and see their beautiful destroyer. Justin's voice got there attention and as they saw a shadow forming over them, they began to run in all sorts of directions.

BOOM! Andrea's foot landed, creating mini sand waves that swept many of the children away. Some weren't so fortunate as the sand was difficult to walk in. They cried out in terror as a foot the size of a cruise ship landed on top of them. At first they felt nothing. It was merely difficult to breathe and all light was shut out. That was until Andrea put all her weight on that foot to step into the sand box. The poor children were ground into the coarse sand, and at their size it was like being pressed into hills of sharp stones.
11112.title: the sandbox isn't fun anymore

choices: the children decide to climb up on Andrea to get her attention
they decide to climb into her purse and wait for her to leave
111121.content:
The children scream out in terror as some of their friends are crushed into the sand. The gigantic woman has no clue what she has just done. The sand feels so good against her foot, she squeezes her toes into it even more. Justin and Shin run from the giantess and head to the corner of the sandbox. Only about four other kids make it while the others were crushed or are trapped under Andrea's towel. Justin signals to the remaining children and they follow him to a safe spot. The giant woman brings her other foot into the sandbox and it has the same destructive effect. Luckily, no one was squished this time. She takes a few more steps then sits down onto her towel. The giantess stretches her hands high into the air, temporarily blocking the sun from the tiny children below. She then pulls up her skirt some and unbuttons her blouse. She slowly lays back. The children are knocked on their asses once her back slams into the sand.

"My god Justin, what are we going to do? We are like the size of bugs!" Shin is breathing hard and fast. "Iiis this a bad dream or did some of our friends really get crushed?" "I hope it is a dream, but everything seems real to me. The rest of us have to get out of this mess somehow, but thats my mom over there. She will help us out," says Justin. "But she's a giant now, what if she can't see us," cries out one of the kids. "We have to try something," replies Justin. Next,
111121.title: Decision Time

1111211.content: Justin stared at his Mom and said to his friends, "We have no choice, we've got to try and get her attention and hope she doesn't squish us". Shin put his hand on his friend's shoulder, "But Justin doesn't your mother hate bugs? She might squish us before we can even try and contact her!" Justin looked back at his mother, saw her mountainous form rise and fall to the rhythm of her steady breathing. Looked at her giant fingers each the size of a school bus, its nails painted blood red. He looked at her feet, which had crushed many an insect. He recalled the expression of disgust on his mother's face before she would squish bugs, and he shuddered. Justin snapped out of his flashbacks and said "we'll just have to take that chance". The children looked at each other with looks of anxiety. They knew there was no other way. If Andrea got up and left without them, they may never escape the miniature hell. But where to start?
1111211.title: climbing the giantess

11112111.content:
The children scurried nervously toward Andrea's gigantic feet. Despite the fact that they were huge and grotesquely disproportionate to the children they still managed to retain their majestic beauty, and they didn't smell too bad either.<br /><br /> The boys finally reached the heel of the foot. One of the boys was running a little too fast and ran straight into her heel. He rebounded off her foot and like a gymnast rebounds off a trampoline and the children around him erupted in laughter.
<br />
<br />
Far, far above Above felt something very small tickle her heel. She sat up and looked down to see what it was. There at feet stood a group of exceptionally tiny black ants. If they weren't moving she might not have spotted them they were that small. Her eyes narrowed, her lips compressed and her face took on a look of utmost contempt. She may have hated bugs, but she loathed ants. They were so horrid, feeding off the crumbs of others. Eating whatever they could get their hands on. They weren't even alive, they were mere machines doing whatever the queen ant instructed them to do. They were pathetic. The thing she hated most about them was their size. So were so small that people could crush them without noticing. So small it wasn't funny, and she hated that. She was a god compared to them, and to her they served one purpose; to be crushed under her like the bugs they were.
<br />
<br />
<br />
How do they get crushed?
11112111.title: The goddess and the ants

11112112.content:
They stood infront of Justins mothers giant hand. Her fingers were dug into the sand, making it easy to climb onto. Slowly they made their way upwards, they stopped once they reached her chest.
"Ok, now what?" one of the boys asked.
"Well, the best place to get her attention would be her head right?" Justin replied. The rest nodded in agreement.
"But how do we get up there?" The girl asked.
Justin looked around, His mothers breast towered behind then like giant hills, then he saw somthing, her golden hair draped down the side of her head, and onto her shoulders. "We can climb her hair!" he announced. The others agreed. They slowly made their way towards her shoulders. The strands of hair were perfect in size, but they had a large climb ahead of them.
Taking deep breaths the children started, it was easy going, untill Andrea sat up, Leaving the children dangling, Shin's strand of hair began to swing around her face!
"ahhh!" Shin cried as he swung quickly through the air. He finally stopped, he signaled to the others that he was ok, and started climbing. He felt gust of wind coming from above him, looking up he stared into the giant nose of Andrea. Then looking directly ahead he saw he was right infront of her giant lips. A strong burst of wind pourd out of her lips, He held on tightly, soon they began to part.
Andrea streached her arms and opened her mouth widly in a yawn, Shin stared horrified into the giant cavern infront of him. Gleaming white teeth sparkled in the bright sun light, light filling her mouth completly, her toung pushed back into her mouth. To add onto his fear the toung lowered revealing a massive throat, seemingly large enough to swallow a bus! With her mouth still open she began to lay back down, soon Shin dangled ubove the massive cavern. The others climbed quickly reaching the top of her head, and ran to aid their friend. Shins weight was making the hair droop, and to shins dismay slipped inside her mouth.
"Shin!" Justin yelled. He scrambled down his mothers forehead and down her nose. He saw Shin trying to pull him self up out of Andreas mouth. He grabed onto the hair and pulled, "Guys!" he yelled back to the others, "Help!"
11112112.title: trouble

111121121.content:
They groaned as they tried to save Shin from his horrifing fate.
Andrea felt somthing on her lip, prepared to lick it! Shin felt somthing under his feet, he began to rise. The others looked forward to see a giant pink wall rising infront of them!
"Watch out!" Justin cried, but it was too late, her massive toung was already on top of them. All of the children were pulled into her gaping mouth! Luckly, Andrea sat up, making her mouth level for her passangers, who she held unknowingly in her mouth. She pulled the strand of hair out of her mouth.
Inside the six children huddled ontop of her soft, yet massive tounge. She opened her mouth again to yawn, filling their new prison with light, Justing flinched when light filled her giant throat, they were at the mersey of his mother!
"We can't sit here, its too dangerous, lets move under her tounge..."
111121121.title: inside

1111211211.content:
They fall into a long tube then a Big Room.That can only be the Stomach.There a much Liquid inside and some part of Food.The Kids Fist can´t see much in the Dark Chamber.Breathing for the kids is very difficult,because Air is smelling very Acid....

Choose:

The Kids Stay Alive or get Digest...
1111211211.title: Into the Stomach

choices: Go to her nose and try to get her attention
111121122.content:
"Pull Shin up!" Justin yelled.
The children all grabbed Shin's strand of hair and started pulling.
Slowly but surely Shin was making it away from that cavernous mouth and closer the Andrea's gigantic forehead.
"You alright Shin?" Justin asked once Shin reached the top.
"Yeah thanks guys, I thought I was a goner there." Shin said.
"No problem." you reply, "Now how do we get her attention?"
111121122.title: They pull shin to saftey

1111211221.content:
Andrea, sitting up, continues to soak in the afternoon rays, slowly lulling her into a conscience, yet comatose state. Little does she know, that at this very second her son and his friends are trying despretly to contact her.

"what should we do?" asked Shin, looking around at the smooth landscape of the top of Andrea's forehead. "We have to get onto my mom's nose", said Justin, beginning to take in the words he just said, walking over to look down the curve of the forehead to the upturned nose below. "This can't be a good idea", the girls chimed in as they joined him looking at the fleshy structure below. "I know... I know... but we have to do this, there is no other way!" He retorted, wiping the sweat off his forehead, "When I say go, we all have to jump, and hopefully we'll all land on the tip of her nose safely." "This is crazy", replied Shin, "But I guess we have to do, what we have to do." "Alright!" Justin yelled out, "On the count of three... 1...2...3." And with this, all the kids took one anthers hands and jumped off the top of Andrea's forehead, spiraling and bracing themselves fo a crash landing on the tip of the goddess' cute upturned nose.

"Ahhhh" they all scream as they fall. Before they know it they land with a bounce upon the very tip of the beautiful blonde's retrousse nose. "Help us! Help us" they all yell in unison up to her, but at the moment she is checking out this cute guy across the park, giving him flirty eyes. "MMMmmm" you hear her mutter as you all stand up and continue to jump up and down, trying to gain her attention. "Come on MOM!!!" you yell up to her, being joined by Shin and the others, as they begin to spread out, running to different areas of your mother's upturned nose. Most of the girls run across the base of her nose and leap onto her outflared nostrils, since they are closer to her eyes, while you and Shin are still jumping around on the tip of her perfect upturned nose -Boing Boing Boing- "Down here, look down here!"

"Thats It!" you let out, "I gotta get her attention some how." You run across the base of her delicate nose, with each step your feet sink into the rubbery surface, and then up its bridge and began pounding the area between her eyes.
1111211221.title: On your mom's nose

choices: all of them make it inside
some are still climbing when she grabs the purse
1111212.content:
Andrea's purse is in the corner opposite of the children. "That is the direction we all have to go in," says Justin as he points over to the giant purse. "Look how far away that is. I am hot," complains one of the children. "We have no choice, I do not want to be stuck here," says Justin. He then starts walking across the sand and one by one, the kids begin to follow.

Andrea's body is extremely enormous. It takes up a good portion of the sandbox. Occasionally she changes her position and this causes earthquakes for the tiny explorers. One of the kids starts to cry, terrified of the giant woman. "I don't want to be a bug, I want to be normal again," he sobs. "Snap out of Joel, we need to be strong if we are going to survive," says Justin. The journey takes nearly ten minutes and the group is exhausted when they reach the purse. It towers high above them and luckily has soft cover. Tiny hairs stick out the that the children can climb on. "Come on, we have to get inside that pocket before she gets up!" Justin leads the climb up as the others take their time. Just then, Andrea begins to sit up. Next,
1111212.title: The Journey

11112121.content:
It's a struggle to climb up into a purse when your so small but somehow all of the survivors manage to clamber up and fall into the giantess' purse.
No sooner had they all made it into the purse when the purse started to shake violently, the purse was moving upwards a sure sign that Andrea had finished sunbathing and was heading home or maybe she was heading over to Shin's.

Where was she headed??
11112121.title: Made it

choices: on a counter in the kitchen
on the floor near the couch
111121211.content: Andrea lets out a sigh, and assumes her son is at his friend's house. She then gathers up her things, and walks back to the car. Andrea tosses her purse onto the passage seat then takes off. While Andrea acted casual as she left the park, every time her purse moved slightly, there was chaos for the kids inside. Lipstick, change, paper, and all kinds of other things are stuffed inside Andreas purse. The kids are pushed around and nearly crushed on their trip to the car. They scream and struggle to survive while the mom has no clue what is going on. Andrea makes it to her house. She grabs her purse then walks inside. She plans to call Shin's mom in a little bit to check in on Justin. Andrea kicks off her shoes as she comes inside and sits her purse...
111121211.title: A Bumpy Ride

choices: some of the kids run to drink from the soda puddles
some of the kids run toward Andrea for help
1111212111.content:
Andrea tosses her purse onto the kitchen counter then opens up the fridge. From the children's point of view, the purse soared through the air slammed against the counter. The kids are all scattered about in the gigantic pocket they climbed into. Most are pretty bruised up and in a lot of pain. The ride in the purse was so bad because of how large all the objects inside are. The children were too tiny to push anything away. Even a piece of gum knocked a few of them around. One by one, the kids climb out of the purse, onto the counter.

"When is this going to end, I just want to go home," complains Shin. "I don't know, but I hope my mom is able to see us," says Justin. The door to the fridge closes and Andrea walks over to the counter and sits a plate down. The sound from the plate striking the surface pierces the children's ears. Andrea appears completely enormous to the kids. "God, she must be a mile tall," cries one of the girls. They shiver in fear as she moves around the kitchen. Andrea opens up a can of soda and sits it on the counter near her purse. A couple drops of soda splash out of the can. Even the can is the size of a sky scrapper to the kids. Andrea then pulls out a knife and begins to chop up the fruit on her plate. Next,
1111212111.title: Climbing Out

11112121111.content:
Shin and Justin look around at their colossal landscape and Andrea's gargantuan form fills their vision, a blonde goddess of immense proportions. Some of the other children stand around them just staring at the giantess as she slices up some strawberries on her plate. Just a few feet away from the group of children is the monolithic soda can and some of the group walk up to it in wonder, more so at the swimming pool sized spheres of soda that lie beside it. While the massive mom prepares her meal, he group deliberates on what to do.

"Perhaps we should walk up to her and try getting her attention," says one of the girls, Amy. "She probably wont even see us, we're even smaller than ants to her at this size," exclaims another. "But what if we all made a pattern on the counter, she might notice it and then we'll be saved," replied Stuart, one of the older boys in the group. Most of the other kids just sit around while the few argue, until finally, Shin, pointing to a group of about 4 kids who've reached the giant balls of soda, breaks in, "What are they doing over there?"

Like a stage cue, the Justin's giantess mother turns from cutting up fruit and lays the knife down near the miniscule group.

"Mmm, all I need is a bit of cream to go along with these strawberries...oh, what a mess I've made with the soda," she remarks, looking straight at the drops of soda on the counter.

"RUN!! Get out of there!" shouts Justin as he realizes his mother's intentions, "quickly, get out of the soda!"

Hundreds of feet above them all, the giantess reaches down with a single finger to gather the drops. The group of 4, a boy and three girls stare up in horror as the tree trunk of a digit bears down on them. Screaming, a couple of the girls immediately jump out of the puddle, but the other two are transfixed in horror as Andrea smiles on unknowingly.
11112121111.title: Soda bubbles...

111121211111.content:
Andrea's massive pointer finger, painted red, quickly moves down to the drip of soda. 2 kids are still swimming inside as her finger wipes over them and a loud squeaking sound is created that is deafening to the other to two kids near the action and the other four back at the purse. Slight vibrations cause mini earthquakes.

Justin watches in horror as his mom raises her finger to her lips. One of the kids on her finger is already smashed, a stain. Beside him, the other kid screams as she is slowly inserted into Andrea's mouth. Her breath is warm and overpowering to someone that tiny. Justin's mom wraps her lips around her finger and then slides it out creating a kissing sound... only with no more kids.

She then takes a drink of the soda. "Wow that was surprisingly tasty for a little drop!" As Justin, Shin, and the two others watch the remaining two girls still near Andrea, they see them scatter. The mother moves the plate slightly and sets it on one of them, instantly obliterating them. The other girl runs to Justin and the others...but she is spotted. "What's this? Eww a bug!" Justin's mom turns and walks across the tiled floor, her feet causing loud booms as she gets a fly swatter. "I hate bugs. Disgusting pest!" Andrea raises the swatter up as the girl watches in absolute fear. As the swatter is heard swishing down, all she can do is scream. SMACK.

Justin cringes as he sees the flat fly swatter on the counter where the girl once stood. The massive hand of his mom gripped the handle with force so dominantly. Andrea raises it and sees the bug is barley alive. That isn't good enough for her. She brushes it off to the floor. She raises her foot up and the girl sees under her wrinkly sole. Stains from the children in the sandbox remain. BOOM!

Justin knew what happened to her. Andrea, satisfied, wiped her foot and walked away. "Guys what do we do!?" One kid asked. "Let's spilt into teams of two. Me and you, and Justin and the other." Says shin.
111121211111.title: Uh oh

111121211112.content:
Andrea's mobile phone rings and she picks it up, nevertheless, the soda kids are far from safe as she reaches for them with her other hand.

"Hi Megami, no I haven't seen either Shin or Justin. I just figured they would be at your place," booms the giantess. While the main group of children stare on, barely able to comprehend the scene unfolding, Andrea presses her finger onto the drop of soda containing the young children. Instead of being crushed however, the tiny children end up being stuck fast to the goddess' finger as the sticky soda adheres them onto her skin. Screaming and shouting at the giantess, they are slowly brought up to her smiling lips and Andrea's intentions for the four becomes apparent.

"She's gonna eat them!!" Stuart shouts in realization.
"Quick, we have to divert her attention, maybe if we all run to her strawberries, she'll forget about them and move her strawberries away, thinking we're bugs. There's nothing that my mom hates more than bugs," Justin says, hurrying toward the plate containing the food of the goddess.

The four children are barely able to move on the soft sticky surface of the giantess's fingertips. Strong vertigo hits the group as they are brought up higher and higher away from the table, passing the soft black blanket of cloth that covers Andrea's tight white blouse and burgeoning bust. Meanwhile, Shin and Justin's group rushes towards the plate of strawberries and cream that looks more like a snow covered hills in the shadow of the mountainous goddess. Together, they manage to climb and grasp onto the side of the plate and slowly, they tumble into the thick cream amidst the red strawberries that dot the landscape.

"Alright guys, lets head to the center of the plate, there's a lot of cream there and we're sure to stick out!" directs Justin, hastily moving to the middle of the group.

Back on her finger, the four children are subjected to a rollercoaster of movement as Andrea moves her finger around lazily while chatting with Shin's mother, Megami. One of the girls, Sandra gets sick and blacks out for a few moments, but is soon awakened by the strong gusts of wind blown from Andrea's gargantuan mouth as she speaks, "I'll be sure to let you know if they drop by here dear..and by the way, these strawberries you sent over the other day look positively delicious! I'll call you back when I have some news...bye now."

Stuck in place, they watch helplessly as Andrea's blimp sized lips slowly part, revealing her wet, pink tongue unfolding in the darkness. A gust of humid air, heavy with the scent of orange soda envelops them as Andrea brings her finger closer to her titanic mouth. The children can barely see anything other than the giantess' perfectly straight front teeth stretching all the way to the back where her long, shapely uvula guards the entrance to the subterranean depths of her body. Panicking and on the verge of breaking down, the kids pass the threshold of Andrea's lips and are roughly licked off by the tip of her slimy tongue.
111121211112.title: They survive Andrea's grasp

choices: Notices Shin's hat in the sandbox and steps in to retrieve it.
Accidently drops something in the sandbox.
1112.content:
Justin and Shin, aswell as his other friends in the giant sandbox heard enourmous thumping noises that grew louder and louder by the second. At first they thought it could of been another earthquake starting. That is until a huge shadow covered all of the children!
Justin and the other kids looked up and were terrified at what they were seeing. Standing before them was Shin's mom, Megami. Except only now she was enourmous! At that size, the kids seemed like ants compared to Her. They couldnt be any bigger than 2cm tall!

"Shin?! Its time to come home for dinner now!" Megami called out in her now powerful voice that rocked the poor little kids eardrums a bit. For being Japanese, Megami did speak pretty good english. And Shin's parents would usually talk to Shin in english alot since he was born here in America and didnt really understand Japanese all that good.

Megami herself was an overall pretty good looking Asian woman. She was also about 5'9ft tall. Not nearly as tall as Justin's mom, but pretty tall for an asian woman.

Megami looked around the park and realized how strangely empty it was. She figured that Shin and his friends probably left the park and ran off to the nearby mall again. Megami swore that if Shin ever left the park with his friends again then he'd be grounded for a whole month! Yet she was completely unaware that her tiny son and his friends were right down below her in that sandbox, crying and very scared. Seeing her son is nowhere in sight, Megami is about to leave until she
1112.title: Shin's giant mom

choices: The hat Shin's mom is about to grab,
11121.content:
Megami was just about to leave the park until she noticed something familiar in the middle of the sandbox. It was Shin's hat! She knew Shin always liked to wear that paticular hat when playing with his friends and would never leave it behind.

A bit worried, she decided to step in the sandbox and retrieve the hat. This is when the children realized they were in serious trouble! Shin and the others watched in horror as Megami's huge black leather sandal began to descend down into the sandbox.

"Run!!" One of the kids shouted out! As Megami took her first step into the sandbox, she felt something strange underneath her foot. Looking down she saw she had stepped in a patch of wet sand. She had no idea why it was wet. Unlike the children however, the wet sand did not cause Megami to shrink because she was an adult ((Assuming adults are immune to its effects))

The children continued to run for their lives down the sandy dunes as Megami took another step to retrieve her sons hat. The huge black monster that is Megami's sandal sinks down into the sand just a few feet ((from their POV)) beside Justin and Shin, causing them to lose their balance and fall. Shin looked up and realized they were now very close to his mothers giant feet and the abandoned hat he wore earlier.

"Where are the others?!" Justin asked. Shin looked left then right and quickly realized their other friends were nowhere in site! A sick feeling overcomed Shin. Did his mother just do the unthinkable to their poor friends? Justin then looked up and saw Megami reaching down for the hat.

"Come on man! We have to get out of here before something bad happens to us!" Justin said and pulled Shin along. Both boys then quickly ran over and grabbed onto
11121.title: Giant foot cometh

111211.content:
Shin leaps onto the hat just before Megami can scoop it up. Expecting to be hoisted up into the air, he clutches the hat with his arms and legs. And yet, the hat seems to stay put. Gradually, Shin's focus leave the hat and he looks up to find his mother staring right at him. Megami looked as though she'd been hypnotized, and that was not far off.

Looking down, Megami had a strong sudden urge to protect her son. She reached over to collect him, then some sort of ancient, primeval coding took over.

As his mother's hand gently wrapped around him, relief washed over tiny Shin, but that was short lived. Instead of being lifted to his mother's chest or face, Shin fond him on the inside of Megami's knee length skirt. With one hand Megami pulled her panties aside and with the other, she stuffed her son into her warm awaiting vagina. Shin struggled like crazy and his mother loved it. She closed her eyes, relishing her son's return, as she pushed him past her sensitive opening before sealing him in with a squeeze of her womanly muscles.

Petting herself and purring contently, Megami suddenly realize where she was. Embarrassments rushed through her as she hurriedly rearranged her garments and check to she if anyone had seen. No one had, which was fortunate. It would have been bad enough being seen by a neighbor but Megami could have killed herself had Shin witnessed that... indignity...

Still she could still feel a lingering sort of tingle down there. She quickly scanned the park for her son. All she wanted to do now was collect Shin and head home. But she couldn't spot him. All she seemed to see were attractive available men. Hell, even the women were starting to look nice. Megami tightened her thighs; hell bent on ensuring nothing passed between her legs. This itch was not going to get the better of her... at least not until she had the opportunity to scratch it fully.

Mean while Justin was still hiding behind a dune, staring in absolute horror.
111211.title: some sort of ancient, primeval coding

111212.content:
Justin and Shin made their way over to the massive foot. Just before they grabbed onto it, they heard two familiar voices crying for help!

"Hey! Thats Lisa and Andrew! They're still alive!" Shin cried out! Justin and Shin quickly run over and helped the two other children who were partially buried beneath the sand by Shin's moms foot!

"Oh god what happened?!" Lisa said. She then looked up and saw the endless figure of Megami towering above them!

"No time! Just follow me!" Justin said then ran over to the massive sandal clad foot. Justin,Shin,Lisa, and Andrew climbed onto the sole of the sandal and held on tight to the leather straps. The children were immediatly hit with the strong scent of foot sweat and old leather.

"Ahhhh!! Hang on!!!" You cried out as Megami then,
111212.title: All aboard the mighty sandal

choices: the lower half of Megami's body
the upper half of Megami's body
1112121.content:
The children cling to Megami's enormous sandal in terror as she walks toward the nearest park bench and sits down. They grip it even tighter and some begin to whimper as she unconsciously starts moving it back and forth.

The children scream in unison as a particularly violent flick of Megami's foot sends them all flying through the air.

They're headed towards:
1112121.title: a casual flick of the foot

11121211.content: The children fly through the air towards Megami's lower half. Shin screams as he realises they're headed toward Megami's
11121211.title: where?

choices: They manage to avoid the oncoming hand
They are knocked off and end up sliding down Megami's leg
111212111.content:
The kids scream as they are sent flying blindly thru the air! Luckily they came to land on a soft black surface. Shin recognized it and realized it was only his mothers skirt! Meanwhile Megami decides to get more comfortable while waiting to see if her son returns. She slips her feet out of her sandals to air them out. She then reaches into her purse and pulls out a small magazine and a snack. The blistering heat was killing Megami, but not as much as the tiny kids. They were getting exhausted. Megami then takes a bite of the turkey and roast beef sandwich shes holding. Suddenly a hail of white colored boulders rained down torwards the children!

"Look out!" Justin cried. The kids barely managed to jump out of the oncoming objects! Out of curiousity, Shin felt the boulder and noticed how unusually soft to the touch it was. It also was filled with strange little pores. He then looked up and noticed the sandwich his mom was holding in her hand.

"Wait a minute. These arent rocks. These are bread crumbs." Shin said. Everyone sighed in relief. Megami then looked down and noticed the crumbs all over her skirt. She then proceeds to gently sweep the crumbs off her lap with her other hand!

"Ahhhhh!! Watch out!" Justin yelled out. Then,
111212111.title: Megami's lap

choices: Pull themselves up into her underwear to avoid falling down
Fall a short distance then latch onto her inner thighs
1112121111.content:
"Everybody, RUN!" Yells Shin as he sees his mother's hand approach. Justin is the first to start running and after the rest of the children follow him without hesitation. Although the fastest in the group, Justin wasn't the brightest and he didn't realise he was running towards the front of Megami's skirt until he almost fell over the edge.

Fortunately for the children Megami brushed the crumbs off to the left of the skirt and they managed to avoid her giant movements. On the down side, the same hand that brushed away the crumbs was now being used to adjust the skirt they were standing on.

The kids fell onto the soft bouncy surface of Megami's legs and as the bench the giant mother was sitting on was sloped upwards the kids began to roll underneath the skirt and came to a halt as they collided into her underwear.

Megami stands up.
Do the kid's....
1112121111.title: Under the skirt

11121211111.content: as they climb into the underwear many start to relized that they're about a year older. turns out they're age is growing faster too! Megami feels an itch and scratches herself south *wink* and all of the kids are pushed in, deep. in to her womb. Megami doesn't have sex anymore because she had experenced menapause at the early age of 30. the kids soon adapted to eating blood, built stuff out of flesh and soon had a mini-city. the kids, when older began to reproduce and the average life span was about 3-5 days. and after many generations (or 2 weeks) one found something the original kids wrote on the wall. that there will be a Opacoulipes (Megami will die) in 60 human years. they didn't worry about it then but 60 years later, they had become so advanced that they had all gone on 3 ships (close to 400 people) and went on to a freasher human. this one was a teenage, about 19. and every 60 years they'd somethink like that.
11121211111.title: A mini-city

choices: Stay where they are and potentially get squished
climb back up and then into her panties
11121211112.content:
Before the kid's realise what's happening Megami stands up and the kids fall from under her skirt, thankfully for them they bounce into her inner thighs and grab hold of her soft creamy flesh before they fall further.

The kid's decide to stay where they are for the time being as it seems a safe enough place to rest until Megami stops walking. Some of the kids change their minds as they see Megami's other awesome thigh's swing arching dangerously closer towards them every step she takes. Justin is one of these children.

"Shin! let's climb higher and hide in her undies for a while! That way we won't be risking any future squashy situations, and we wont have to hold on." He yells at Shin.

"Bleh! She's my mum, I don't want to go in her undies and besides what makes you think she'd squish us? Shes my mum, she'd never hurt me!"

"Shin, she doesn't know your down here! She probably wouldn't even recognise you as human if she saw you anyway. We've got to hide there its our only chance!"


Do they...
11121211112.title: on her thighs

1112121112.content: Megami's goddess like hand knocked all the kids off their feet and sent down tumbling right down her leg. The poor children all screamed in terror as they slid down the soft skin of the giantesses bare leg! They then were launched off the top of Megami's foot like a ski ramp and headed straight for,
1112121112.title: Leg chute

11121211122.content:
All four children ended up landing onto a soft and slightly moist surface. Its not the pavement by any means and smell around them is terrible.

"Oh god! Where are we?!" Lisa says. Justin and Shin survey their surroundings for a moment. Justin spots a rather large number "9" printed onto the surface that seems to be somewhat faded. While Justin is still confused, shin is the first to immediatly realize they are in his moms sandal!

"Guys! We're inside my moms shoe!" Shin exclaims!

"What?!" Andrew says before the surface beneath all four of them starts to shake and rumble! All four children are thrown off their feet before Megami's barefoot begins to lower into the sandal! Andrew and Lisa are immediatly flattened beneath Megami's big toe as it slides torwards Justin and shin like a fleshy avalanche!

"Noooo mommy please dont step on meeeee!!" Shin screams before his moms mighty toe knocks him flat on his back and smears him into the insole. Justin continues running but slips and lands face first into the imprint created by Megami's big toe. He gags as he gets a mouthfull of sweat and dead skin flakes. Suddenly a huge shadow casts over him.Turning over, the final thing he saw was Megami's big toe lowering down onto him. Justin couldnt believe this is it. Megami was such a nice person to him at normal size. Always treating him like her own child and a very fun person to be around with. If only he was able to get her attention sooner. Now Hes going to die beneath her foot and she wont even know it. Justin covers his eyes before the inevitable happens..........

Megami tightens the buckle on her black sandal before heading back home. A week passes and still no sign of the children. Megami and Andrea called the police and they searched the whole area but found nothing. No sign of Justin, Shin, Andrew and Lisa. Megami sits on her couch and crys over her missing son. Megami is still wearing the same sandals she always wears to work, which she removes from her feet and continues weap. If she were to look close enough, she could still see the dead children that are buried beneath the grime and sweat. But nobody will ever find out what happened to the children. Megami will simply just walk all over them for the next three years until she wears the sandals out and throws them away.
11121211122.title: A horrible end for the children

1112122.content: Megami lived pretty close to the park so she didnt need to drive over there to look for her son. Plus it was good exercise for her aswell. The kids screamed in terror as the massive sandal clad foot slammed onto the asphalt surface. They hung on tight and prayed to god that nothing deadly would happen to them. Justin and his friends feared that they could be dislodged and splattered all over the pavement. Or even end up beneath Megami's powerful bare sole and become little stains inside her sandal! The kids continued to hang on and scream as Megami enters her house. Megami then walks into the living room and turns on the TV to relax a little. Hoping her son would return home soon.
1112122.title: Going home

choices: Shin watches his giantess mother as she knowingly squishes Andrew "a bug"
11121221.content:
As Megami proceeded to the living room, she figured she may as well make herself comfortable. After all, it was already quarter til 1 and reruns of her favorite show, Desperate Housewives of Orange County, would soon be on. She walked over to the sofa and sat down, sighing in exhaustion as she plopped down. After flipping the TV on, Megami leaned forward and stared down at her size 9 feet.

Her feet were very well maintained. Being moisturized regularly with no sign of dryness, the skin was very soft and pillow-like. The toes were of perfect form and shape, plump and soft. Her arches had a few wrinkles and her heel was like a giant pillow of skin. The nails were trimmed frequently and were always painted a different color each week, this week being a glittery deep blue. They never stank either. Infact, the moisturizer gave them a slight strawberry fragrance. Megami was admiring her feet so much, she couldn't help but wiggle her toes a bit. She thought about how her husband admires her feet almost as much as she does and sometimes likes to "play" with them. Sometimes Megami would pretend to shrink and crush her husband and put her feet on his face. She would sometimes squish ants under different areas of her foot until they were nothing more than gooey, mushy blobs stuck to the underside of her beautiful feet.

Meanwhile, Justin and Shin are looking up in amazement. Megami's enormous wiggling toes cause them to loose balance and fall face first into the sandal. Suddenly the wiggling subsides and Justin looks up to see a big wall of flesh. Luckily, it is only the side of Megami's massive sole, but where is Shin and the others? Justin gets up and walks towards the heel of the massive left foot when he feels something latch onto his ankle. He looks down to see Shin's hand around his ankle, pulling himself out from under the arch of his mothers foot. Shin got to his feet and couldn't help but mention how glad he was that his mother kept her feet well moisturized, for that aided in his ability to slide out from under her soft silky foot. Shin continued for a few more seconds before Justin interupted.

"Where are Lisa and Andrew?!" Justin exclaimed

"I-D-K." shin said.

As Megami was still admiring her feet, unaware of the 4 children at her feet, Justin and Shin set off to look for Lisa and Andrew. Shin climbed up the sandal strap nearest the heel for a broader look of the landscape. "Do you see them?," Justin asked. Shin, squinting his eyes, searched along the sandal of the other foot. "Not ye....Oh I think I see them!," Shin gasped! Lisa was sitting next to the giantesses big toe on the right sandal. Andrew appeared to be stuck in the carpet fuzz after being knocked off from earlier's encounter. He was right near Lisa, but more so to the side of Megami's big toe.

Shin slid back down to the sandal to tell Justin there whereabouts. The two quickly ran toward the toe section on the sandal and looked across to see Lisa looking over at them, then down at Andrew, who just managed to free himself from the fuzz. Andrew was too small to lift himself up onto the sandal, and too heavy for Lisa to lift him alone so he made his way over the left sandal, where Justin and Shin had been, and the two were able to pull him aboard. Lisa on the other hand, was too afraid to move. Shin was trying to persuade her but it was no good, she was too afraid.

Suddenly, Shin heard his mom giggling to herself. "Hmm, I think I'm going to take my sandals off so I can feel the soft carpet between my toes, maybe I'll moisturize them too."
All four children looked up in terror as the train-sized fingers began descending towards them. Shin and Andrew were quick to grab on to a strap of the sandal, while Justin had his own plan.

"Justin, where are you going?," yelled Andrew.

"To get her attention." Justin Shouted.

Justin climbed onto the glittery deep blue toe nail of her big toe and proceeded up on top of her silky smooth foot toward her hand and jumped on it, holding tight to her ring finger. The giantess, still unaware of her bug sized buddies, drew her left foot out of her sandal,moved her sandal to the left, and gently placed her foot down on the carpet. Shin and Andrew, still on the sandal, did nothing but watch as the giantess mother let out a relaxed "ahh" as she curled her toes in the carpet.

Justin is holding on for dear life, but while the giantess was enjoying the feeling of the left foot on the carpet, she raised her hands up above her head and Justin went flying up and landed on the sofa side table, knocked unconscious from the hard landing.

"That's amazing," Megami moaned, "Time for the other one." she said as she reached for her right sandal strap.

Petrified by the sight, Lisa is motionless. Andrew is trying to get her attention but its worthless. She just stands there as the giantess unstraps her sandal and slides her beautiful peds from it. The giantess mother picks up the sandal and sets it aside as before, but doesn't notice the ant-sized Lisa fall off and land on the carpet in front of her.

Lisa turns over to see the beautiful foot of her friends mom slowly descend and again cannot move, even if she wanted to she was stuck in the carpet fuzz. Megami's ungodly large, football stadium sized, cold,soft heel comes down at the feet of Lisa and slowly starts coming forward. Lisa can't believe she is about to be unknowingly squished under the foot of, from her perspective, a goddess. She begin's screaming, "PLEASE! MRS. SMITH!! PLEASE DON'T SQUISH ME! PLEEEEAASE! I DON'T WANT BE CRUSHED! AHHHHHHHH!!!"

Megami can be heard above, expressing her enjoyment for the feeling of the carpet against her foot as Lisa is disappearing under the wrinkles in her arch, which are constantly compressing and contracting as her massive house-sized toes flex up and down repeatedly. Slowly, Megami lowered her foot, her toes now pointed up and out as her sole came down, closing off any last rays of light for Lisa, who was now face deep in the soft fluffy skin of her arch, closer towards the heel.

Surprisingly enough, Lisa doesn't feel much pressure. YET. She began to think of how she ended up here, pressed into the carpet underneath such delicate a foot, that to her was not delicate at all. As the giantess's foot flattened out on the carpet, pressure on Lisa's body began to grow as more and more weight was shifted atop her. She screamed out in agony one last time. "MRS. SMITH, YOUR SQUISHING ME UNDER YOUR FOOT! PLEEEASSE STOP! NOOOOO....."

Unfortunately her cries are not heard by the towering goddess above who is now curling her toes and sliding her foot slightly back and forth on carpet. Lisa drew one last breath as she heard the giantess moan sensationally and felt her foot press even harder into the carpet. Lisa finally felt her ribs break one by one. Her arms and legs were already crushed completely flat under the immense weight that lay upon them. All she could do now was hope the end was near, wishing she would just be squished to get it over with, she didn't care if she would be a pile of goo in the end, and she didn't have to wait much longer either.

The sensation Megami was receiving was making her hungry. "Hmmm, I think I'm gonna go get a snack, I'm reallly hungry."

Lisa heard what she was saying and felt the weight lift slightly off her body. She didn't know the condition she was in, she only knew pain. The weight was the only thing keeping her from bleeding out. There was a slight ray of light shining in from the under the giantess mother's arch, just enough for Lisa to see. She looked around to see how badly she was injured, and nearly had a heart attack at the sight. Her legs were nothing but gooey mush, stuck to the base of the arch at the heel. Her right arm was was broken, but her left arm was crushed into the carpet. her torso was flattened as well, embedded deep in the fibers of the carpet. Suddenly it was dark and she knew what was happening.

*SQUISH* *CRUNCH* *SPLAT*

Megami stood up with all of her weight on her right foot, grinding the remains of Lisa into the carpet below her. She had no clue she had just crushed the life and guts out of her son's friend.

Meanwhile, Shin and Andrew, seeing that Lisa had fallen off of the sandal, ran over to see where she had landed. By the time they got around the giantesses left foot, they were too late. All they heard were Lisa's final screams as the giantess mother stood up, then bones breaking and flesh shredding. They were so dazed by what they had just seen that they had no time to even think of moving out of the giantess mother's way.

Without warning, The giganitic left foot swung over the two boys heads and landed right in front of them, The heel missing Shin by only fractions of an inch!

Shin's towering mother proceeded to the kitchen, leaving behind a red stain that was once Lisa embedded deep into the carpet. Andrew and Shin both cried at the site of their friends mangled remains. A few minutes pass and Shin's mother returns with a bowl of popcorn in her grasp. Shin signals Andrew to hide under the sofa with him, but he doesn't comply. Instead he sits down on the carpet and waits. Shin leaves him and runs under the sofa and looks out as his mother walks toward Andrew.
11121221.title: The Unaware Giantess

choices: Megami notices Andrew "bug" on the floor.
111212211.content:
Meanwhile, up high on the side table, Justin regains consciousness, not sure where he was or what was going on. As he sat up, his head began pinging with overwhelming pain. He looked around to see a big wall of white on his left and a transparent wall on his right. In front of him was a big white landscape, which he soon realized was the sofa. He tried standing up, but quickly feel over after taking a step. Apparently the fall caused him to severely sprain his right ankle. Using the vast white wall to lean against, he quickly remembered what had happened, he was shrunk to the size of an aunt and he was trying to get Megami's attention. Then it dawned on him...

"Shin....SHIN...Shin, where are you," he called for Shin, but he heard no answer. "Shit, I must have fallen off of her finger and landed...here...where the hell am I?"

Justin studied his surroundings and quickly realized he was standing on the side table next to the sofa. The gigantic transparent was as a vase of some sort with roses in it. The same roses that Shin had bought his mother for Mother's Day.

Justin seized his thoughts as a big white glob of goo fell from above and landed right at his feet. It had a strawberry scent to it. Looking up, he quickly figured out it came from the giant white wall next to him, which was a bottle of Lotion. Before he can move, another blob falls down and plops around him.

"Damn it!" he says, "Now I'm gonna smell lik..

SMACK!!

Another blob lands on top of him, causing him to fall face first into the mass of lotion. He is trying to fight his way out when he here muffled booming sounds from around him. Megami is walking back into the room with a bowl of popcorn. He hears her walk over and sit down on the sofa right next to the end table, unaware of what is about to happen.
111212211.title: Lotion Sickness!

choices: Andrew tries to get Megami to notice him
1112122112.content:
Megami set the bowl of popcorn down on the coffee table in front of her, then all hell broke loose! Megami spots a "bug" on the floor at her feet! "Oooo an ant! I loooovve little ants, especially when I get to squish them flat underneath by massive, beautiful, soft toes!"

Hearing this, Justin quickly forces his way from the lotion and runs tot he table edge. Looking down he sees a speck on the floor. At first he thought it was just a tiny ant. He jumped on to the sofa arm, forgetting all about his severely sprained ankle until he hit the firm fabric with a loud *smack* as he nearly slid off the side of the arm. He mumbled cuss words to himself as he struggled to pull himself to the top of the arm.

When he crawled to the top, he hurry towards the edge of the arm right next to the giantess mother's left hand. He gazed down in amazement and shock. It was Andrew! Down in between two of the biggest and most beautiful feet to ever walk the earth. He was laying face up on the carpet staring directly into the eyes of the giantess that peered down upon him.

Andrew had originally intended to climb up the towering goddess and get her attention, but now that she spotted him, he had to resort to a different plan. It was either wave his arms and scream for help, hoping she wouldn't simply squash him flat, or run like hell for the sofa also hoping not to be crushed flat under her massive feet.
1112122112.title: A Tough Decision

111212212.content:
Megami walked over and sat down on the sofa right above Andrew, who was now sitting about 2 inches out from the sofa as her enormous peds came to rest on either side of him. He quickly thought to himself that maybe he could get her attention, maybe if he waved his arms she would see him. Only problem was that she was not looking down. Not yet anyway...

Andrew stood up and ran out toward the coffee table, hoping to get a view of the giantess mother's face. Unfortunately at his height, the angle of view did not change much at all and Andrew could not see anything past her knees. He was also exhaust from running all the way to the coffee table, so he sat down to catch his breathe. He wasn't very fit either, his parent had always let him eat whatever he wanted, so he was a bit chubby.

As he sat there thinking of another way to get the giantess's attention, he couldn't help but notice her glittery blue nails of her toes as she curled them into the carpet, then his face lit up with a smile.

"That's it!," he said snapping his fingers, "I'll climb on one of her toes! I'm sure she is sensitive enough to feel me walking on her toes, then she will look down and see me waving my arms and we will all be ss..WOOHHH!!!

Andrew was intrupted as the unaware giantess mother lifted her right foot and moved it in his direction. He turned around to run, forgetting the coffee table was right behind him..."SMACK"...Andrew ran right into the table and feel on his back, looking up to what he thought was his final moments as the foot hovered over his tiny, unseen body.

"OH NOOO, THIS IS IT! I'M ABOUT TO BE MASHED UNDERNEATH HER TOES!"

Andrew waited for sudden death, but it never came. He opened his eyes to see the huge ceiling of flesh resting against the coffee table, the sweet scent of strawberry filled his nose. He sighed in relief. Then he heard the goddess speak.

"Finally my show is on! I wonder who's gonna fight this time!"

As the Megami was enjoying her popcorn and her show, Andrew decide now would be a good time to get the hell out from under her foot. Only problem was that he was somewhat pinned between the carpet and her soft skin where her arch meets her sole. She was also very sensitive in that area, so Andrew had to work extra slow and carefully so he wouldn't spook her.

It was tricky, but he was just about out when the gigantic flesh ceiling shifted a little bit more pressure on his leg as he became stuck, his body sticking halfway out from under the enormous sole. He decided to just yank it free, but that was a big mistake.

Megami quickly lifted her foot back and peered down to search for what tickled her. Andrew didn't move a muscle as the eyes of the giantess searched the area.

"AHHA!," Megami exclaimed, leaning down toward Andrew, "A tiny little bug playing around my feet ehh?" "Do you like them little bug?" "Do they smell nice?" She had a very odd grin on her face as she questioned the tiny bug, which she had no idea was one of her son's friends. "I have no idea why I'm asking you these things, I know you can't talk."

Andrew was so horrified, he didn't know what to do.

"Well are you gonna run little bug?" "Isn't that what you normally do when you are spotted?" said Megami.

Megami was silent for a few more seconds, then an evil grin came across her face, and Andrew was so scared he nearly pissed himself.

"I think I know why you're not running away. You think my feet are so beautiful and soft, you want to see them some more, right?"

Meanwhile, Shin was calling for Andrew, who heard him and decided to take a run for the sofa when...

BOOM! The giantess mother slams her foot down in front of Andrew, blocking his escape. "Now where are you going little bug? Are you embarrassed because I know you want my feet? Don't feel that way, I love when bugs your size want to feel my warm soft soles squish, I MEAN rub against their tiny body. And I am ready to do that for you little bug, now HOLD STILL!"

Andrew had no where to run and no time to think. He was doomed. He looked to the skies to see the gigantic hand come and scoop him up, holding his body firmly so he would not squeeze away.

With Andrew clenched in her hand, Megami walked over in front of the TV and sat down on the carpet with her legs out straight. She carefully placed her new "bug" friend on the floor in front of her, then drug her feet back towards her along the carpet, angling them so that the bottoms were facing inward.

"So, little bug, I think I will call you....Andrew! I don't know why, but I feel like calling you Andrew."

Andrew cannot believe what he is hearing. Not only has this giantess mother mistaken him for a bug, but she ends up calling him by his own name.

"Ok, Andrew, remember my beautiful feet you love so much? Well...HERE THEY COME!

Andrew looked around to see two enormous walls of flesh slowly moving towards him. tried running away but it was no use. In a matter of seconds he was pinned between bother of her truck-sized pinky toes. He was squirming around trying to climb out from between them.

"Hehehe, that tickles, Andrew, NOW CLIMB UP MY BEAUTIFUL TOES BEFORE I CRUSH YOU RIGHT NOW!" Megami demanded.

Andrew, obeyed the goddess and climbed his way up her long, soft toes, being pinned, briefly, between each pillow-like toe along the way up. When he reached the inner side her plump, big toes, he heard the goddess once again.

"You're a good listener for a bug Andrew, and I like that." Megami continued. "The last bug didn't listen to well and uhm...he didn't make it past the first couple minutes."

"What does she mean 'the last bug,' she does this regularly?" Andrew mumbled to himself.

As he was climbing between Megami's soft big toes, he thought the space between them was getting tighter...and it was! Megami was intentionally closing the gap between her toes. She wanted to feel his squirming reaction as he tried to pry the soft, cushioned skin away from his face. The sensation reminds her of how good domination feels when the one being dominated is so small and insignificant.

"How does this feel Andrew?," Megami asked, "You just love when my massive pillowed toes completely close around your body without harming you, allowing you to breathe in the sweet aroma they give off." "I know you love it, and you have been such a good listener, therefore I will allow you to spend a minute or two in between them."

Andrew didn't know what to do or think. He had no chance of crawling away. Before he knew it, he was completely trapped by the giantess's soft silky smooth skin of her enormous toes. He was so small he could almost squeeze between the groves of her toe print. As his face was pressed against the skin, the last bit of light that shined upon him vanished and it was dark. The sweet scent of strawberry still in the air. He figured he may as well get used to this, after all, it may not be that bad in the end. Maybe she will let him go. He was so exhausted from all the excitement that he began falling asleep. Her feet where too comfortable, he couldn't resist. He gave one of the toes a kiss and fell to sleep.

Meanwhile, Megami was planning on what she wanted to do next, she loved playing with her bug friends slowly, making sure she got full pleasure out of there tiny little lives before grinding them to a mushy, gooy pulp under her sole. But at the same time she wanted to watch her show. She knew she could always find another bug to toy with, so she made her desicion....It was crunch time for Andrew.

The giantess mother quickly spread her toes apart to reveal Andrew, who was stuck face first to the toe on her left foot.

"Alright little Andrew," giantess Megami said as she quickly, but gently pushed Andrew back between her unbelievably silky smooth soles.

Andrew quickly awoke to the giant finger pushing him deep between those ungodly large soles.

"I am missing my show because of you Andrew," Megami bellowed, as she pushed Andrew dead center of her soles. "I am missing my show and I am not very happy with you at the moment." "Do you know what happens to tiny bugs that make me unhappy? DO YOU?

As if expecting a reply, Megami quickly pressed her soles together blocking light once again for poor Andrew, who was now feeling a bit of pressure for the first time from the giantess as she squeezed him between the soft flesh of her freshly scented soles. He didn't know what to expect next. Was this it? Was she about to squash his puny body lifeless? All these different thoughts were running through his mind.

Suddenly the pressure was gone and Andrew hit the floor face first. When he rolled over on his back, he saw that the giantess was dangling her right foot over his small speck of a body. She then brought the toes down slowly and placed them on the carpet above where his head lay. He was staring directly into the moist sole of the giantess mother.

"When tiny bugs like you make me unhappy, I choose an area of my foot that I like, usually my sole because it is the most sensitive. Then I put said bug in the direct path of that area and slowly bring it down on them. At first it doesn't hurt because my feet are so soft, but as I press harder,the bugs will start squirming, and I LOOOVVEE when bugs squirm under my sensitive feet. It tickles me so much I begin to press harder to make it stop, building up pressure even more so on the bugs tiny body, until finally *CRUNCH*!!! then I feel there guts splatter all over my feet and grind it one last time deep into the carpet. One time a bug was still a live at the end of it all, so I left him stuck to my heel for almost a week after."

Megami gazed down at the speck one last time before deciding how to end his life.
111212212.title: An Enjoyable Squish Underfoot

11121222.content:
Megami walks into the kitchen and opens up the refridgerator. Shes had a rough day today, not to mention with her own son leaving the park without her permission. Megami grabs a strawberry wine cooler and a left over deli roast beef sandwich. Megami opens up the bottle and pours the contents into a glass with ice. She grabs the sandwich and glass then sits down at the table and begins reading a magazine. Megami has no idea that her son and his friends are still hanging on for their lives in her sandal!

"What should we do next? We could climb up your mother, shin." Justin said.

"I dont know! Thats awfully high and dangerous!" Shin responded.

"Well we cant just stay on your moms foot forever! We'll get killed!" Justin tells him. The kids then have a little argument but ended up deciding to,
11121222.title: A snack break for the mom

choices: Megami raises her foot and stomps
Megami kneels down for a closer look
111212221.content:
Justin, Shin, Andrew, and Lisa climbed off of the leather sandal. Safe for now, The kids began to scurry across the wooden floor away from the giant mother.

"What do we do next?" Justin asked. Shin thought for a second. He knew his own kitchen better than anyone else in the group. He then spotted an unplugged power cord hanging off the side of the counter!

"We'll definatly have better chances of survival if we get to the top of the counter. Lets try to climb up that power cord over there." Shin said and pointed at it.

Meanwhile Megami swallows a mouthful of sandwich and takes a drink of her beverage. She happens to shift her eyes over to the right and notices four little black objects slowly moving across the floor! Megami sets her glass down and sits up out of her chair. The kids then began to feel the ground beneath their feet shake!

"Whats that?!" Andrew said! They kids all turned around and gasped in terror as Megami slowly stomped torwards them! She places her hands on her hips and is looking straight at the tiny insects!

"Mom! Mom! Help us!" Shin cried out and began waving his arms up and down! The other kids joined in and started to do the same thing! Hoping Megami wouldnt mistake them for bugs! Just then,
111212221.title: Spotted?

choices: "These bugs are really interesting.  I think I'll play with (or crush) them"
"Is my mind playing tricks on me, or does that bug look like a little Shin?"
1112122212.content:
Megami notices the 4 little bug-sized creatures on her sandal.

"What in the world?", Megami said, staring curiously at the four children. She put her hands on the ground so she could get a better look at the "insects".

"I've never seen bugs act like this before," Megami said quietly to herself, unaware that her son and his friends were desperately trying to get her attention.

Megami gently picked up her sandal, which felt like an earthquake to the four children, to exam it further.


What are Megami's next thoughts?
1112122212.title: Megami kneels down for a closer look

choices: Magami attempts to eat her tiny son
11121222122.content: “Is it me or does that look like my son”, she thinks to herself. Shin stares up at the beast, in amazement and confusion. “Shin, how did you get so small?” She asked, but it was no use, to shin her voice was deeper than deep, she sounded like a monster and her words were unintelligible. This scared him and he ran, meanwhile his mother snapped into a different mood. “I can’t have a tiny son! The community will think I shrunk him and they will arrest me for life!” Upon realizing this, she couldn’t let her son roam free. The giant beast snatched its shrunken offspring and placed the poor child on her meal, and place a large piece a bread over him, Magami put her son on her sandwich, and was prepared to swallow him in order to despose the evidence. “NO!” Cried Justin, but it was futile. Shin was scream, how could his mommy swallow him? He sobbed and screamed like an animal in distress.
11121222122.title: "Is my mind playing tricks on me, or does t...

111212222.content:
In the end, climbing Shin's mother seemed like the most appropriate choice to help them. As both reached her leg, they gripped on and began their journey upward. After only 5 minutes, Shin and Justin reach Megami's upper shin. "This is taking too long, Justin! " Shin cried out of breath. Justin nodded "ya, but we're soooo close!" he cheered and began to climb once more. After about 3 minutes they reached her knee cap. "were about half way there now, shin!" All joy and cheering had stopped suddenly; Megami was crossing her legs! "Justin!" Shin called desperatly holding onto his mothers leg. Justin twisted through the air landing with a squishly plop.

Megami chugged down a mouthful of her wine cooler, relaxing instantly. She finished the page and set her magazine down.


Where did Justin land, by the way?
111212222.title: Begin climbing up Megami

choices: Andras comes in,and drinks the boys?
11121222211.content:
Megumi,her a small plop,and looked around,she didn't notice the tiny boy,that was her best friends son,in her cup. Oh Well,she though.
Justian was swimming and shouting. Shin,and a teenager name Tim,looked,at, Megumis drink. "Justin!!" Shin shouted,then a huge earthquake,and both boys, fell next to justin.SPLASH!!! Megumi,tohguth she saw something,but,just shook it off,she went, for, her drink,and the three,boy's, looked up in horror.
"This day sucks!!!"Tim said.
"Yeah...."Justin said.
"I'm gonna die,by my own mom!!" Shin said. just them.....
11121222211.title: Slapsh and Crash

choices: She hears a knock at the door...
111212222111.content: Megumi brings the glass up to her face, licking her plump lips in front of her screaming son and his friends before bringing it up and sipping at the liquid inside. The boys cried out as they began to be sucked towards the cavern that was Shin's mother's mouth. "Swim away!", Justin cried out loudly as Megumi gulped down a mouthful of her drink. Tim yelped as he felt his legs start to cramp up. With a scream, he was quickly sucked towards Megumi's thirsty mouth and passed over the lip of the glass, then Megumi's tongue, and finally being swallowed down the massive mother's gullet. Megumi swallows and takes the glass away from her lips with a loud sigh of satisfaction, smacking her lips loudly to savor the flavor of the wine cooler as well as another flavor that briefly grazed her pallet. Justin and Shin tread the liquid in horror as they watch the giantess get ready for another drink. Just then...
111212222111.title: Megumi drinks the boys

11121222212.content: Justin landed right on a green leafy surface that was Megami's sandwich itself! He struggled within the thick honey mustard/mayo surface but it was to no avail, Megami opened her mouth and took a monster bite out of the sandwhich! The remaining children screamed and cried as Megami chewed the contents. It was just an awful site to watch! Megami swallowed the chunks of food and smiled. Licking her lips. Megami feels a tickling sensation on her legs and then,
11121222212.title: Justins death

choices: Megami goes home to wait for Shin
Megami meets up with some other parents
11122.content:
The shrunken children huddled together as the towering figure above them moved towards the sandbox. She did not seemed focused on the sandbox, but rather, at something beyond it. Shin watched as his mother waved at something or someone beyond their vision. Suddenly, something humongous landed near where the children were huddled, sending sand and dust flying everywhere. Where once a fifty foot sand dune stood, a massive wall of white and red filled their vision.
"It's my mother's coin purse! Quick, we can get out of here if we climb into it!" Shin shouted to the frightened kids. He knew that if they could all climb into the purse pocket, maybe they could get Megami's attention. Quickly, the children scrambled to climb onto the open pouch of the checkered purse.

"Oh!" Megami exclaimed as she stepped into the sandbox to retrieve the purse, unaware of the tiny beings inside.

Justin stopped in horror as he saw the sky disappear under the pale white hand of Megami as she bent down to pick up the purse he was scrambling to get into. It didn't occur to him just how big she was till he saw her goddess sized face, bigger than anything he had ever seen...
11122.title: Bring back the sun

choices: Goes back to his room and plays his guitar and computer
Begins to clean up the milk
111222.content:
Megami walks over to some other mothers looking around for their children. Soon voices start to boom around the children. The parents all talk for what seems like ages before one father remembers that the school was offering a camp for the weekend and that you may have all gone by accident. It seems quite possible to the parents and Andria being worried decides to ring the school. More talking and then to the shock of the children Megami brings out Shin's had and starts to shake it in front of Andrea. As she does the children all fall out into Andria's shopping bag. They land in with the milk and butter makeing them colder than they've ever been.
-/20 minutes pass/-
Andrea sits down to watch television. She's had one hell of a day with work and then to be abused by Megami like that! She sits down and watches as her 16 year old son wanders into the kitchen and to drinks straight from the bottle.
"DANIEL! How many times do I have to tell you?! Talk about middle child syndrome!" Andria snaps and terrifys Justin who makes the mistake of running to his brother's foot. Shin is swimming like mad trying to escape the milk Daniel spilt on the floor. Justin has no idea where any of the other children are but he has no time to think about that now as Daniel's toes wrap around him (thank god he's just dressed from having a shower!). Daniel now:
111222.title: A whole new world, a whole new home

1112221.content: Me and the other kids landed on Daniel´s big toe, OMG! it was as big as a football stadium, Daniel began to walk to his room, every step roomed like a earthqueake,!!!
1112221.title: WILD RIDE!!!

info.brief_description: this cursed park has an odd effect on the kids who go to play
info.description:
Here's some quick and easy rules to live by:

No one word or one sentence chapters, they will be deleted

Try and keep the giants unaware of the shrunk kids

If you add characters, do your best to keep track of them

Only kids/teens are shrunk down to size by the park

Characters so far:

Justin - 10 years old
Shin - 11 years old
Justin's mother Andrea 40 years old
Shin's mother Megami 32 years old
